text: Thank you for your help! I'll do that right now

Hi Team,

I was trying to integrate HubSpot with CallHippo. The integration was successfully completed, and I have attached the relevant snapshots for your reference.

However, when I try to submit a review on the HubSpot Marketplace, I am prompted with *"Which account would you like to continue with?"* or sometimes *"Create a new account"* instead of being redirected to the review panel.

Could you please look into this issue and let me know how I can proceed with submitting the review?

If any one have any idea of this error, please let me.

Hello, we have a live marketplace listing (<https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/apps/glances-225230>) - however our we are no longer able to access the developer management area or marketplace listing area. it's like it was disconnected from our account. What can I do to fix this? Our developer instance is ID: 8185600 and we have a test instance ID: 8191577
